eu.excitement.entailment.core.representation.parsetree

Interface NodeInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultNodeInfo

    public interface NodeInfo
extends java.io.Serializable
    [DELETEME_LATER: imported from BIUTEE 2.4.1 with no modification] Represents the information of the contents of a BasicNode.

    The information in this object does not contains information about the edge that connects the node to its parent. That kind of information is given by EdgeInfo

    Author:
    Asher Stern

    • Method Detail

      • getWord

        java.lang.String getWord()
        Returns:
        the word. or null if this node does not represent a word.

      • getWordLemma

        java.lang.String getWordLemma()
        Returns the lemma (root form) of the node. For example, "was" has lemma "be". "went" has lemma "go". Note, that whether that information exists depends on the parser. null is legal here.

        My advice, if the parser does not returns this information, Use another tool (hopefully you have another tool for that) on the BasicConstructionNodes returned by the EnglishSingleTreeParser to add this information.

        Returns:
        the lemma (root form) of the node

      • getSerial

        int getSerial()
        Returns:
        the serial (location in the sentence) of the word represented by this node. The returned value is undefined if the node does not represent a word. (You can know whether the node represents a node by testing whether getWord() returns null).

      • getSyntacticInfo

        SyntacticInfo getSyntacticInfo()

      • getNamedEntityAnnotation

        NamedEntity getNamedEntityAnnotation()
        Returns the Named-Entity annotation of the node. I'm sorry for the method name. It should have been getNamedEntityAnnotation().
        Returns:
